In England, in the seven days to 31 October, there were 232,820 new confirmed cases (411.7 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 24 October, there were 265,155 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 12% (32,335 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 05 November is 7,852,005 (13,885 cases per 100,000 population).
